Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: Typical Nubian necklace of the Middle Kingdom and the Second Intermediate Period. It is comprised of a row of blue enamel disc-shaped beads. The central design is composed of three disc-shaped beads made from ostrich eggshell surrounded by a few flat beads made from blue paste. Other groups of such flat beads have been strung in a regular arrangement along the entire length.
